apis.description:
Retrieve the list of appointment groups that can be reserved or managed by
the current user.

operations.notes:
Retrieve the list of appointment groups that can be reserved or managed by
the current user.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: Defaults to "reservable"

parameters.name: context_codes
parameters.description: Array of context codes used to limit returned results.

parameters.name: include_past_appointments
parameters.description: Defaults to false. If true, includes past appointment groups

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Array of additional information to include. "appointments":: calendar event time slots for this appointment group "child_events":: reservations of those time slots "participant_count":: number of reservations "reserved_times":: the event id, start time and end time of reservations the current user has made)

apis.description:
Create and return a new appointment group. If new_appointments are
specified, the response will return a new_appointments array (same format
as appointments array, see "List appointment groups" action)

operations.notes:
Create and return a new appointment group. If new_appointments are
specified, the response will return a new_appointments array (same format
as appointments array, see "List appointment groups" action)

parameters.name: appointment_group[context_codes]
parameters.description: Array of context codes (courses, e.g. course_1) this group should be linked to (1 or more). Users in the course(s) with appropriate permissions will be able to sign up for this appointment group.

parameters.name: appointment_group[sub_context_codes]
parameters.description: Array of sub context codes (course sections or a single group category) this group should be linked to. Used to limit the appointment group to particular sections. If a group category is specified, students will sign up in groups and the participant_type will be "Group" instead of "User".

parameters.name: appointment_group[title]
parameters.description: Short title for the appointment group.

parameters.name: appointment_group[description]
parameters.description: Longer text description of the appointment group.

parameters.name: appointment_group[location_name]
parameters.description: Location name of the appointment group.

parameters.name: appointment_group[location_address]
parameters.description: Location address.

parameters.name: appointment_group[publish]
parameters.description: Indicates whether this appointment group should be published (i.e. made available for signup). Once published, an appointment group cannot be unpublished. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: appointment_group[participants_per_appointment]
parameters.description: Maximum number of participants that may register for each time slot. Defaults to null (no limit).

parameters.name: appointment_group[min_appointments_per_participant]
parameters.description: Minimum number of time slots a user must register for. If not set, users do not need to sign up for any time slots.

parameters.name: appointment_group[max_appointments_per_participant]
parameters.description: Maximum number of time slots a user may register for.

parameters.name: appointment_group[new_appointments][X]
parameters.description: Nested array of start time/end time pairs indicating time slots for this appointment group. Refer to the example request.

parameters.name: appointment_group[participant_visibility]
parameters.description: "private":: participants cannot see who has signed up for a particular time slot "protected":: participants can see who has signed up. Defaults to "private".

apis.description: Returns information for a single appointment group

operations.notes: Returns information for a single appointment group

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Array of additional information to include. Ssee include[] argument of "List appointment groups" action. "child_events":: reservations of time slots time slots "appointments":: will always be returned

apis.description:
Update and return an appointment group. If new_appointments are specified,
the response will return a new_appointments array (same format as
appointments array, see "List appointment groups" action).

operations.notes:

the response will return a new_appointments array (same format as

apis.description:
Delete an appointment group (and associated time slots and reservations) 
and return the deleted group

operations.notes:
Delete an appointment group (and associated time slots and reservations) 
and return the deleted group

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: cancel_reason
parameters.description: Reason for deleting/canceling the appointment group.

apis.description:
List users that are (or may be) participating in this appointment group.
Refer to the Users API for the response fields. Returns no results for
appointment groups with the "Group" participant_type.

operations.notes:
List users that are (or may be) participating in this appointment group.
Refer to the Users API for the response fields. Returns no results for
appointment groups with the "Group" participant_type.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: registration_status
parameters.description: Limits results to the a given participation status, defaults to "all"

apis.description:
List student groups that are (or may be) participating in this appointment
group. Refer to the Groups API for the response fields. Returns no results
for appointment groups with the "User" participant_type.

operations.notes:
List student groups that are (or may be) participating in this appointment
group. Refer to the Groups API for the response fields. Returns no results
for appointment groups with the "User" participant_type.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: registration_status
parameters.description: Limits results to the a given participation status, defaults to "all"
